title: 'Queer Palme' celebrates biggest year for LGBT films in Cannes
text:
'Queer Palme' celebrates biggest year for LGBT films in Cannes 1:36am IST - 02:15
'Rafiki', 'Sorry Angel' and 'The Harvesters' are just some of the films offering more sophisticated depiction of gay life and raising profile of LGBT issues - 'Queer Palme' founder. Rough cut
